nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back Monthly 157: The Flight of the Falcon is the one hundred fifty-seventh issue of the Marvel Star Wars UK series of comic books.
This issue includes one of the few original comic stories in the series, The Flight of the Falcon. It was later reprinted in the Classic Star Wars: Devilworlds series.
This issue reprints the second of two parts of the story printed in the US as Star Wars 57.
